Title: Strange Friends
Writer: Baoyuan Li, Lei Xu, Tianxia Xu
Actors: Ling Li, Yunxia Wang, Jingbo Zhan, Chao Zhang
Plot: An emotionally disturbed woman encounters two passengers on a train who befriend her and ultimately save her from self-destruction. Her fellow travelers find out she has a criminal past but they show her friendship and give her hope.
